# thetalake_retention_policy (Data Source)

Theta Lake Retention Policy Data Source. Retrieves information about a retention policy.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "thetalake_retention_policy" "example" {
  id = "123"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) Retention Policy ID

### Read-Only

- `description` (String) Retention Policy Description
- `name` (String) Retention Policy Name
- `retention_period_days` (Number) Retention Period in Days
